item.description:
a bike ride on Memorial Day Wknd, starting at 10 to beat the crowd sure to fill the path this day..   We'll park in the Vet's Parkway lot, and on the grass if we need to... leave as a group and enjoy this ride, one of my favorites...13 miles each way to Bristol and back, with a stop in Bristol for a drink, or more... join us.  we have had up to 45 with us in the past.  Fast, slow, it doesnt matter.  Fun is what we like!!!

We can do brunch at that diner at the end of the path in Bristol, as we did once last yr... then return to Providence in the beautiful sun
item.name: Bike Ride on East Bay Bike Path
